brand.name: Biff-Buff Detailing
brand.tagline: Premium Mobile Car Detailing at Your Doorstep
brand.objection_handle: We come to you, saving you time while delivering a flawless finish that protects your investment.

hero.headline: Luxury Mobile Detailing That Comes To You
hero.subtext: Experience a premium finish without leaving your home or office.

image.alt: Premium car detailing service with luxury finish
image.image_search_query: premium mobile car detailing service luxury finish

about.story_text: Biff-Buff Detailing was founded to bring top-tier car care directly to your doorstep. We understand the value of your time and your vehicle, offering expert detailing that fits your schedule.
about.founder_note: As a car enthusiast, I wanted to create a service that combines convenience with impeccable quality. Your car deserves the best, wherever you are.

features.title: Convenient Mobile Service
features.description: We come to your home or office, saving you time and hassle.

features.title: Premium Quality Finish
features.description: Using only the highest-grade products for a flawless shine.

features.title: Eco-Friendly Products
features.description: Safe for your car and the environment.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: Book at a time that suits your busy lifestyle.

contact.headline: Get Your Premium Detailing Quote Today
contact.subheadline: Contact us to schedule your mobile car detailing service.

service_area.headline: Our Service Area
service_area.description: Proudly serving Philadelphia and surrounding neighborhoods with premium mobile car detailing.
